meanings: (하고 싶다) (동사로 쓰여) want (to), would like to, wish (to), (formal) desire (to), feel like (doing)
(~한 생각이 들다) (동사로 쓰여) look, seem, appear

phrases.phrase: 제가 변화를 주고 싶다고 하긴 했는데.
meanings: 헤어샵에서 Well, I did say I wanted something different.

vlive.korean: 집에 가고 싶다고요? You want to go home? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 태현 탄신일❣
엔시티 들어가고 싶다고요? You want to join NCT? 듣기 View video NCT : 안녕하세요 시즈니!! 제노에요진짜 잠깐 하려고 하는데.. 제노가 보고싶으면 들어오세요!! 이제 시작합니다
제 집에 오고 싶다고요? You want to come to my place? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 태현 탄신일❣
vlive.english: You want to come to my place?

vlive.korean: 지금 먹고 싶다고 막 손... Someone raised his hand to eat this. 듣기 View video ASTRO : 따나의 얼렁뚱땅 떡국 만들기🐥🍲
vlive.english: Someone raised his hand to eat this.

vlive.korean: 아 너 연보라 하고 싶다고 했었잖아! You wanted to do light purple! 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE TV “34th Golden Disc Awards DAY 1”
vlive.english: You wanted to do light purple!

examples.korean: She said she wanted a dog but it was only a passing fancy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 개를 갖고 싶다고 했지만 그것은 일시적인 바람일 뿐이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She said she wanted a dog but it was only a passing fancy. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I told my mother I wanted to leave school but she didn’t approve. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 어머니께 학교를 그만두고 싶다고 말씀드렸지만 어머니는 찬성하지 않으셨다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I told my mother I wanted to leave school but she didn’t approve. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: So you want to be a writer? Well my advice is, don’t give up the day job. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그래 작가가 되고 싶다고? 글쎄, 내가 하고 싶은 충고는 본업에 충실하라는 거야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: So you want to be a writer? Well my advice is, don’t give up the day job. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The government has said it wants to create a stakeholder economy in which all members of society feel that they have an interest in its success. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 정부는 사회의 모든 구성원들이 사회의 성공에 이해관계가 있다고 느끼는 주주 경제 단체(같은 사회)를 창출하고 싶다고 말해 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The government has said it wants to create a stakeholder economy in which all members of society feel that they have an interest in its success. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Harris Hughes, the engineer from the fireproofing company, asked me to tell you that he wants to see you personally. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내화 회사의 엔지니어인 Harris Hughes 씨께서 귀하를 직접 뵙고 싶다고 제게 전해 달라고 부탁하셨습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: Harris Hughes, the engineer from the fireproofing company, asked me to tell you that he wants to see you personally. Add to Wordbook
